attributes.action: decrease the time it takes for Disabled Students Allowance to be put into action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current system for granting DSA is very good. Students who start the DSA process early enough stand a fair chance of getting necessary equipment that will help them study for the start of their Degree. However many students face negotiating the tangled web of getting assessment of needs reports, funding from local LEA's and then joining the back of the queue whilst suppliers struggle to cope with demand.
